statements: SELECT * FROM sensor_data
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, location FROM sensor_data
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature'
SELECT location, sensor_type, timestamp FROM sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT AVG(data_value) FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_type
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT sensor_type, location, data_value FROM sensor_data WHERE location = 'Room A'
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp FROM sensor_data WHERE data_value > 50 ORDER BY sensor_id ASC, timestamp ASC
SELECT sensor_type, location, MAX(data_value) AS max_value FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_type, location
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE location LIKE '%kitchen%'
SELECT * FROM sensor_data ORDER BY sensor_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT sensor_type, AVG(data_value) FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_type;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, data_value FROM sensor_data WHERE data_value > 50 ORDER BY data_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM network_devices WHERE location = 'Office' AND status = 'Active';
SELECT device_id, device_type, status FROM network_devices ORDER BY device_id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, data_value FROM sensor_data WHERE data_value > 50.0 AND timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY sensor_type ASC, data_value DESC;
SELECT device_id, device_type, location, status FROM network_devices WHERE status = 'Active' ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, timestamp FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type IN ('Temperature', 'Humidity') AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-01' ORDER BY sensor_id ASC, timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'Pressure' AND data_value < 30.0 AND timestamp >= '2022-02-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_value, sensor_location FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 3;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_value, sensor_location FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_location = 'Room A' AND sensor_value > 50;
SELECT * FROM sensor_devices ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_location FROM sensor_devices WHERE device_type = 'Temperature Sensor';
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, sensor_value, sensor_location FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id > 10 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_location FROM sensor_devices WHERE device_type = 'Temperature' ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT network_name, network_type, network_speed FROM network_data WHERE network_speed > 100 ORDER BY network_speed DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_value FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_location LIKE 'Lab%' AND timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY sensor_id ASC;
SELECT device_name, device_type, device_location FROM sensor_devices WHERE device_location IN ('Room A', 'Room B') ORDER BY device_type DESC, device_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data;
SELECT data_type, data_value FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 2;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM sensor_locations WHERE longitude > 0;
SELECT device_name, network_type FROM sensor_devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT network_name, max_bandwidth FROM sensor_networks WHERE max_bandwidth >= 100 ORDER BY max_bandwidth ASC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT data_type, AVG(data_value) FROM sensor_data GROUP BY data_type HAVING AVG(data_value) > 50;
SELECT sensor_id, COUNT(*) AS data_count FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_id ORDER BY data_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_devices WHERE location = 'Office Building' AND network_type = 'WiFi';
SELECT location_name, AVG(latitude) AS avg_latitude FROM sensor_locations GROUP BY location_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY avg_latitude DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, location FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature Sensor';
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp FROM sensors WHERE location = 'Room 101' ORDER BY sensor_id DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, location, temperature FROM sensors WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, timestamp FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Humidity Sensor' AND location LIKE '%Corridor%';
SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, location FROM sensors WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, timestamp FROM sensors ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT sensors.sensor_id, sensor_type, sensor_metadata.vendor FROM sensors JOIN sensor_metadata ON sensors.sensor_id = sensor_metadata.sensor_id;
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(temperature) AS average_temperature FROM sensors GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING AVG(temperature) > 20;
